entry.title: Associated Press Limits How Journalists Can Use Generative AI
entry.summary: The AP releases guidelines on using generative AI, as the storied news agency emphasizes the role of human oversight in journalism.

entry.title: OpenSea Will Make Creator Royalties Optional for NFT Trades
entry.summary: Once the largest NFT marketplace by trading volume, OpenSea has revealed plans to stop enforcing creator royalty fees on secondary trades.

entry.title: DeGods Co-Founder Departs Amid Falling NFT Prices and Pushback
entry.summary: As one of DeGod’s co-founders stepped away, a known NFT whale pressured the collection’s floor price.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Flash Crash Triggers $800 Million in Liquidations
entry.summary: Bitcoin crashed hard on Thursday afternoon, dipping below $26,000. The rest of the crypto market followed suit—as did the liquidations.

entry.title: FTX and Genesis Reach $175 Million Settlement After $4 Billion Demand
entry.summary: Bankrupt crypto exchange FTX has reached a settlement agreement with Genesis over claims tied to Alameda, though it must still be approved.

entry.title: Google Is Testing a New AI Life Coach
entry.summary: Google is using the power of AI to help you figure out your life. How soon before the machines replace human wisdom?

entry.title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III Revealed—5 Things You Need to Know
entry.summary: Modern Warfare III will offer a new campaign, upgraded maps from 2009's Modern Warfare 2, and the largest Zombies map to date.

entry.title: Coinbase Suspends Tether Trading in Canada
entry.summary: The company is also suspending trading for DAI and RAI, claiming they no longer meet listing standards.

entry.title: Kevin Returns: Pixelmon's 'Horrible Mistake' Reborn as Base NFT
entry.summary: The blocky, meme-fueling creature is back as a $2 NFT on Base, offering perks to holders while celebrating Pixelmon’s disastrous reveal.

entry.title: Grayscale Boosts Bitcoin ETF Team as Potential Ruling in SEC Lawsuit Nears
entry.summary: Grayscale sued the SEC last June after its bid to convert its Bitcoin Trust into an ETF was denied.

entry.title: China GPT? Tencent to Unleash Homegrown AI as Big Tech Races for Supremacy
entry.summary: Not one to be left out, the Chinese tech giant is coming for AI.

entry.title: Bitcoin Plunges Below $28,000 for First Time in Two Months
entry.summary: Bitcoin has dropped to its lowest level since mid-June, likely because of investors fed up of the SEC's delay in approving a spot ETF.

entry.title: Web3 Still Lacks ‘Real Economic Activity’, Says Generative Ventures Partner Lex Sokolin
entry.summary: Unlocking the next phase of the latest tech convergence will mean keeping users safe in a digital economy dominated by bots, said Sokolin.

entry.title: Canadian Expansion Part of ‘2-Pronged International Strategy’, Says Coinbase Exec
entry.summary: Unlike the crackdown the exchange is facing in the U.S., a Coinbase exec said authorities in Canada offer “regulation by engagement.”

entry.title: Philippine National Police Issues Warning Against Play-to-Earn Crypto Games
entry.summary: Besides scams and hacks, Philippines' authorities have also warned of the expensive barrier to entry for some play-to-earn crypto games.

entry.title: $1.7M of Ethereum 'Stuck' in SHIB Layer-2 Network Shibarium
entry.summary: The much-anticipated Shibarium layer-2 network has been marred by a key technical issue with its bridge contract.

entry.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Are Now Less Volatile Than Oil: Kaiko Research
entry.summary: The summer doldrums are hitting Bitcoin and Ethereum hard, dampening the assets’ historic volatility to multi-year lows.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Dip After Fed Hints at More Rate Hikes
entry.summary: Crypto and stocks saw a decline after the U.S. Federal Reserve reaffirmed its aims to bring inflation down to its 2% target.

entry.title: OpenAI Just Bought a Game Studio—But Why?
entry.summary: The ChatGPT creator acquired Global Illumination for an undisclosed amount.

entry.title: Bitcoin Hits All-Time High in Argentina Following Javier Milei’s Shocking Win
entry.summary: Since the crypto-friendly outsider was elected to the South American nation’s top post, Bitcoin’s price has soared there.

entry.title: Apex Legends Star Says AI Won't Replace Human Voice Actors—At Least for Now
entry.summary: Ben Prendergast, who voices Fuse in Apex Legends and Tyr in God of War Ragnarok, predicts that AI will remain in the "uncanny valley."

entry.title: Grimace Forever: McDonald's Is Giving Away Free NFTs That You Can't Trade
entry.summary: McDonald’s answers Grimace Shake hype with free NFT profile pictures on Ethereum scaler Polygon—but only in Singapore.

entry.title: SHIB Developers Deploy Layer-2 Shibarium to Ethereum Mainnet
entry.summary: The speedy layer-2 network is expected to support the various other canine components of an emerging "Shiba Inu State."

entry.title: AI Can Now Reproduce Music by Reading Minds
entry.summary: Think about Pink Floyd's "Another Brick in the Wall,” and artificial intelligence can reproduce the song—or at least something similar.

entry.title: Federal Elections Commission Takes on AI Deepfakes Ahead of the 2024 Elections
entry.summary: A petition filed by the non-profit organization Public Citizen asks the agency to regulate AI-generated deepfake campaign ads.

entry.title: Coinbase Gives Out $120,000 Worth of Bitcoin to WNBA Players
entry.summary: New York Liberty and Las Vegas Aces players earned a Bitcoin bonus amid the WNBA Commissioner’s Cup Championship on Tuesday.

entry.title: Google Steps Up Its Generative AI-Powered Search Game
entry.summary: The search giant aims to hold Microsoft Bing at bay with new features to help users find more information faster.

entry.title: Bitcoin Market's ‘Open Secret’ Could Disappear as Coinbase Offers Crypto Futures in US
entry.summary: A lack of options when it comes to crypto futures has hurt market participants in the U.S., said CoinFund President Christopher Perkins.

entry.title: Apex Legends Voice Actor on AI's Impact on Video Games
entry.summary: Ben Prendergast is an actor who has voiced characters like Apex Legends' Fuse, God of War Ragnarok's Tyr, and Patroclus in Hades. But as debates swirl around the use of artificial intelligence in entertainment in light of the SAG-AFTRA and WGA strikes, Prendergast gives Decrypt's Kate Irwin his honest take on the potential use of AI actors in games.

entry.title: PayPal Confirms It Is 'Pausing' Crypto Purchases for UK Customers
entry.summary: British customers won't be able to buy crypto on PayPal as it navigates regulatory hurdles, the company confirmed Wednesday.

entry.title: Welcome to SCENE: Where Tech Meets Fashion, Art, and Entertainment
entry.summary: Emerging technologies are reshaping mass culture faster than ever. SCENE will investigate and profile those shifts.

entry.title: Crypto Custodian BitGo Hits $1.75B Valuation After Latest Funding
entry.summary: With the newly-raised funds, BitGo aims to meet a new demand for regulated crypto custody solutions and new acquisitions.

entry.title: Ledger Adds PayPal as On-Ramp for Bitcoin, Ethereum Purchases
entry.summary: Ledger users can now buy crypto through the Ledger Live App using PayPal, with direct storage to their hardware wallet.

entry.title: 'Greenwashing': Gitcoin, Shell Sponsorship Draws Fire From Crypto Pundits
entry.summary: At the center of the Gitcoin partnership is greenwashing, a slick marketing scheme some say Shell is employing.

entry.title: Coinbase Lands Regulatory Approval to Offer Crypto Futures Trading in US
entry.summary: The exchange has secured approvals from the NFA and CFTC to start offering regulated crypto futures trading for its customers.

entry.title: Trading Volumes for Newly Launched SEI Token Topped $1B in One Day
entry.summary: Trading volumes for the new SEI token nearly outpaced market heavyweights like Bitcoin, Ethereum, and XRP on top crypto exchanges.

entry.title: Prosecutors Aim to Use Caroline Ellison’s Personal Notes as Evidence Against SBF
entry.summary: A list of “Things Sam is Freaking Out About” has been cited by the prosecutors, which they hope to include as evidence in the upcoming trial.

entry.title: Adidas and BAPE Team for Ultra-Limited Sneakers With Digital Twins
entry.summary: Just 100 pairs of the Adidas Originals Triple-White Forum 84 BAPE Low will be auctioned via NFT passes, which can be redeemed for the kicks.

entry.title: Silvergate CEO Departs With Benefits as Bank Shutdown Continues
entry.summary: The CFO is shipping out at the end of September, leaving only the former chief risk officer at the helm.

entry.title: Star Atlas CEO on Developing an MMO Game
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson speaks with Star Atlas Founder and CEO Michael Wagner about the MMO game's approach to development, marketing, and blockchain integrations.

entry.title: Aurory's Origin Story: How JRPGs Inspired the Games
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson talks to Aurory's Head of Marketing and Business Development Michael Natoli about the origins of the Aurory crypto games at the Solana PlayGG event.

entry.title: Parallel TCG: Inside the Sci-Fi Card Game’s Closed Beta
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin goes hands-on with Parallel’s closed beta on Windows PC to find out what sets it apart from other crypto card-battlers.

entry.title: Web3 Games Need to Compete with All Games, Says Solana Foundation GM
entry.summary: Solana Foundation's General Manager of Games Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about Solana's PlayGG conference and shares his take on crypto gaming and the "play-to-earn" concept.

entry.title: Many Early Blockchain Games Were 'Cash Grabs,' Says Twitch Streamer Alliestrasza
entry.summary: "I wrote them off," Twitch streamer Alliestrasza said of her initial thoughts on many early blockchain games. She tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how her perspective on Web3 games has evolved over time and now sees blockchain games getting significantly better.

entry.title: 'MetalCore' Game Preview: Hands-on With the 'Titanfall' Meets 'Destiny' NFT Mashup
entry.summary: MetalCore is an upcoming mech shooter developed by Studio 369, and it's being developed on Ethereum scaling network Immutable zkEVM. Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin played through the prologue and tested out the recent Alpha 3 online experience to get a sense of the NFT-infused mashup of Titanfall and Destiny.

entry.title: 'Give Projects a Chance,' Says Aurory's Michael Natoli on NFT Game Challenges
entry.summary: Aurory is an NFT-driven game franchise that started life on Solana and is expanding to other chains. Decrypt's Jason Nelson spoke with Aurory Head of Marketing Michael Natoli at Solana's PlayGG event, where Natoli shared his thoughts on the challenges that blockchain games face in reaching players.

entry.title: Solana Is Only Network Ready for Gaming: Solana Foundation's Johnny Lee
entry.summary: Solana Foundation General Manager Johnny Lee tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how the Solana network will tackle the scaling problem that blockchain games pose for the industry.

entry.title: Com2uS Is Going "Full Speed" on Crypto Gaming: Kyu Lee
entry.summary: Kyu Lee is the President of game studio Com2uS USA. In an interview, he shares the studio's approach to Web3 and crypto gaming with Decrypt GG's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Building a Discord Game with AI and Blockchain: 'Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos' Creative Lead Alex Finden
entry.summary: Decrypt's Jason Nelson interviews Alchemy: Battle for Ankhos Creative Director Alex Finden at the Solana PlayGG event in San Diego, California.

entry.title: 'Big Respect Between Ethereum and Cosmos Developer Communities': dYdX Foundation CEO
entry.summary: CEO of the dYdX Foundation Charles d'Haussy unpacks the decision behind moving one of the largest decentralized exchange protocol's over to its very own chain built on Cosmos. A key driver, he told Decrypt at this year's EthCC event, was that instead of launching on a rollup or another layer-1, launching a fully customized chain will allow dYdX to fine tune the network for its product's needs.

entry.title: Ethereum Staking Solution Lido 'Had Perfect Product Market Fit' at Launch, Says DAO's Biz Dev Contributor
entry.summary: Marin Tvrdić, a business development contributor to the Lido DAO, sat down with Decrypt during this year's EthCC to break down how the liquid staking protocol has managed such a massive lead, how it plans to keep that lead, and the protocol's new dual-governance tokenomics.

entry.title: What's Going to Stop All the DeFi Hacks? 'Standards,' Says OpenZepplin Security Architect
entry.summary: OpenZeppelin's security solutions architect Michael Lewellen sat down with Decrypt to discuss how the industry can become a little safer for users at this year's EthCC Paris. The key? Introducing security standards across the industry so folks know what an audit actually means and where risks lie, be it bad faith actors or poor implementation.

entry.title: 'Ev.io' Game Review: Earn Solana While Blasting Enemies
entry.summary: Ev.io is a web-based first-person shooter that's free to play, but lets NFT holders earn in-game currency that can be redeemed for Solana (SOL). Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin shares his review of the fun throwback to Quake-style blasting, albeit with a modern crypto twist.

entry.title: 'Moving Fast and Breaking Things Isn't the Web3 Ethos': MetaMask Product Lead
entry.summary: Account abstraction this, smart wallets that. Discussions at EthCC Paris about improving user experience have pointed at industry leader MetaMask as an example of what not to do. But that may soon change, with a host of updates and optimizations coming to crypto's number one wallet, said its product lead Alex Jupiter. It still may take some time, though, before these changes take effect.

entry.title: Scaling Smart Wallets on Starknet 'Was The Winning Combination', Says Argent Co-Founder
entry.summary: Argent co-founder Julien Niset told Decrypt at EthCC Paris that he wants to make crypto wallets disappear. Or at least how they're currently conceived. From clunky seed phrases to a stiff user experience, Argent hopes to make using crypto a little less intimidating and a whole lot more fun.

entry.title: Inside Mighty Action Heroes' Open Beta
entry.summary: Mighty Action Heroes is the flagship blockchain title from Mighty Bear Games. But is the browser-based battle royale shooter worth checking out? Decrypt's Kate Irwin offers her thoughts and a first look at the upcoming game.
